summary: Uranium must be processed to use it in nuclear weapons or reactors. The National Nuclear Security Administration says its uranium processing facilities are outdated and deteriorating. As part of its overall uranium program, NNSA is planning to build a new processing facility and modernize some existing facilities—at the likely cost of billions of dollars over at least 20 years. We found that NNSA has made...
title: Modernizing the Nuclear Security Enterprise: A Complete Scope of Work Is Needed to Develop Timely Cost and Schedule Information for the Uranium Program
